name: Author: BlackMelvyn
author: BlackMelvyn

sections.description:
This plugin has been developed by BlackMelvyn from this SEO Black Hat blog in order to prevent publication of duplicate posts.

It has a double use :

  • clear duplicate posts
  • save database space by getting rid of previous versions

The plugin will search for duplicate titles upon post publication and remove duplicate entries from the database.
There is no admin panel, just activate the plugin and let it do the rest ðŸ˜‰
Read the source code ðŸ˜‰
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You’re done ðŸ˜‰

short_description: This plugin prevents duplicate posts to be published, especially when running autoblogs.
